30 /*** Include files ********************************************************************************/

34 /*** Defines **************************************************************************************/
35 
36 //! current version of VoIP (maj.min.rev.patch)
37 #define VOIP_VERSION (0x04000000)
38 
39 //! suggested VOIP port
40 #define VOIP_PORT (6000)
41 
42 //! special connection identifiers
43 #define VOIP_CONNID_NONE (-1)
44 #define VOIP_CONNID_ALL (-2)
45 
46 //! maximum number of supported connections
47 #define VOIP_MAXCONNECT (30)
48 
49 //! VoIP conn status flags (use VoipConnStatus to query)
50 #define VOIP_CONN_CONNECTED (1) //!< UDP connection was set up OK
51 #define VOIP_CONN_BROADCONN (2) //!< is connection broadband?
52 #define VOIP_CONN_ACTIVE (4) //!< both sides have headsets & broadband and are exchanging voice traffic
53 #define VOIP_CONN_STOPPED (8) //!< connection attempt stopped
54 
55 //! VoIP remote status flags (use VoipRemoteUserStatus to query)
56 #define VOIP_REMOTE_USER_RECVVOICE (1) //!< voice packets being recieved
57 #define VOIP_REMOTE_USER_HEADSETOK (2) //!< the remote user's headset is setup
58 
59 //! VoIP local status flags (use VoipLocalUserStatus to query)
60 #define VOIP_LOCAL_USER_MICON (1) //!< microphone is on
61 #define VOIP_LOCAL_USER_HEADSETOK (2) //!< a compatible headset is connected and successfully initialized
62  //!< on PC: can only be set when both VOIP_LOCAL_USER_INPUTDEVICEOK and VOIP_LOCAL_USER_OUTPUTDEVICEOK are set
63 #define VOIP_LOCAL_USER_TALKING (4) //!< local user is talking (will be always set for codecs without VAD)
64 #define VOIP_LOCAL_USER_SENDVOICE (8) //!< voice packets being sent
65 #define VOIP_LOCAL_USER_INPUTDEVICEOK (16) //!< user selected an input voice device
66 #define VOIP_LOCAL_USER_OUTPUTDEVICEOK (32) //!< user selected an output voice device
67 
68 //! Invalid shared user index
69 #define VOIP_INVALID_SHARED_USER_INDEX (0xFF)
70 
71 //! maximum number of local users on a single host
72 #if defined(DIRTYCODE_PS4)
73 #define VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS (4)
74 #define VOIP_SHARED_USER_INDEX VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS
75 #define VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS_EXTENDED (VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS + 1)
76 #elif defined(DIRTYCODE_XBOXONE)
77 #define VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS (16)
78 #define VOIP_SHARED_USER_INDEX VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS
79 #define VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS_EXTENDED (VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS + 1)
80 #else
81 #define VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS (1)
82 #define VOIP_SHARED_USER_INDEX VOIP_INVALID_SHARED_USER_INDEX
83 #define VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS_EXTENDED (VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS)
84 #endif
85 
86 #define VOIP_MAX_CONCURRENT_CHANNEL (4)
87 #define VOIP_MAX_LOW_LEVEL_CONNS (32)
88 #define VOIP_MAXLOCALCHANNEL (64)
89 
90 //! VoIP invalid flag
91 #define VOIP_FLAG_INVALID (0x80000000)
92 
93 //! VOIP profiling stat enums
94 typedef enum VoipProfStatE
95 {
96  VOIP_PROFSTAT_RECORD = 0, //!< number of cycles last spent recording data
97  VOIP_PROFSTAT_COMPRESS, //!< number of cycles last spent compressing data
98  VOIP_PROFSTAT_DECOMPRESS, //!< number of cycles last spent decompressing data
99  VOIP_PROFSTAT_PLAY, //!< average number of cycles spent playing data
100 
101  VOIP_NUMPROFSTATS
102 } VoipProfStatE;
103 
104 //! callback event types
105 typedef enum VoipCbTypeE
106 {
107  VOIP_CBTYPE_AMBREVENT, //<! a bad rep auto mute event (only used on xbox one)
108  VOIP_CBTYPE_HSETEVENT, //<! a headset has been inserted or removed
109  VOIP_CBTYPE_FROMEVENT, //<! VoipStatus('from') change
110  VOIP_CBTYPE_SENDEVENT, //<! VoipLocal() & VOIP_LOCAL_USER_SENDVOICE change
111 } VoipCbTypeE;
112 
113 
114 /*** Macros ***************************************************************************************/
115 
116 #define VOIP_ConnMask(_iConnID, _bEnable) ((_bEnable) << (_iConnID))
117 
118 /*** Type Definitions *****************************************************************************/
119 
120 //! The mode a given channel is used in
121 typedef enum VoipChanModeE
122 {
123  VOIP_CHANNONE = 0, //<! (provided as a helper and so debuggers show the proper enum value.)
124  VOIP_CHANSEND = 1, //<! Indicates a channel is used for sending
125  VOIP_CHANRECV = 2, //<! Indicates a channel is used for receiving
126  VOIP_CHANSENDRECV = (VOIP_CHANSEND | VOIP_CHANRECV) //<! (also has a helper)
127 } VoipChanModeE;
128 
129 //! opaque module ref
130 typedef struct VoipRefT VoipRefT;
131 
132 //! event callback function prototype
133 typedef void (VoipCallbackT)(VoipRefT *pVoip, VoipCbTypeE eCbType, int32_t iValue, void *pUserData);
134 
135 //! speaker data callback (only supported on some platforms)
136 typedef void (VoipSpkrCallbackT)(int16_t *pFrameData, int32_t iNumSamples, void *pUserData);
